title.en: Supplication to Lord Mila Shepa Dorje

text.en-trans: namo

text.en: I and all beings throughout space,
text.en-trans: dak dang kha khyab kyi semchen

text.en: Until our own enlightenment is won,
text.en-trans: di zung chang chub kyi bar du

text.en: Respectfully turn for refuge
text.en-trans: kyab né lama yi tsok la

text.en: To the hosts of gurus who are sources of protection.
text.en-trans: güpé yi kyi kyab su chi'o

text.en: We generate the supreme attitude —
text.en-trans: ma gyur sipa yi sem chen

text.en: Wishing that all beings throughout existence, our very own mothers,
text.en-trans: nyur du lamé kyi chang chub

text.en: May swiftly achieve unsurpassable awakening.
text.en-trans: tobpé sem chok nyi kyé do

text.en: Grasping at my own ordinary form and appearance dissolves into the natural state,
text.en-trans: dak lü tamal gyi nang zhen rang sar tong

text.en: And, as the unobstructed self-radiance of suchness, I appear clearly as the yoginī.
text.en-trans: ma gak chö nyi kyi rang dang naljor mar

text.en: In the space above my head, upon a lotus and moon,
text.en-trans: salwé u teng gi namkhar pé dé teng

text.en: Is the guru of unrepayable kindness, Shepa Dorje.
text.en-trans: kadrin khormé zhépa yi dorje ni

text.en: Radiant blue, and dressed in a white cotton robe.
text.en-trans: ku dok ngo dang ré kar gyi nabza chen

text.en: He shows the gesture of meditation as he gazes into space.
text.en-trans: nyam zhak gi chakgya chen nyi namkhar zik

text.en: His form is apparent yet empty, and he sits in the bodhisattva posture.
text.en-trans: nang tong gi ku chen zhap nyi sem kyil zhuk

text.en: Hosts of gurus from infinite realms gather around like clouds,
text.en-trans: zhing rabjam kyi lama trin tar tib

text.en: As he presides amidst an oceanic assembly of ḍākinīs.
text.en-trans: ma khandro gyatsöi ü na zhuk
a ho ye

text.en: Essence of the buddhas of the three times,
text.en-trans: dü sum sanggye kyi ngowo

text.en: Source of the sublime Dharma of non-attachment,
text.en-trans: chakdral damchö kyi jungné

text.en: Supreme among the saṅgha of knowledge and freedom;
text.en-trans: rig drol gendün gyi tso chok

text.en: You in whom the threefold refuge is complete:
text.en-trans: kyab sum kündü kyi ngowo

text.en: Kindly Shepa Dorje, care for me!
text.en-trans: drinchen zhepa dorje dé khyen no

text.en: Embodiment of all refuge-granting gurus,
text.en-trans: kyab né lama yi chi zuk

text.en: Essence of all awakened yidam deities,
text.en-trans: yidam gyalwa yi ngowo

text.en: And supreme lord of oceanic hosts of ḍākinīs;
text.en-trans: khandro gyatso yi tso chok

text.en: You in whom the three-root deities are complete:
text.en-trans: tsa sum kündü kyi ngowo

text.en: Kindly Shepa Dorje, care for me!
text.en-trans: drinchen zhepa dorje dé khyen no

text.en: Crown ornament of the Kagyü teachings,
text.en-trans: kagyü tenpa yi tsuk gyen

text.en: Lord of the ear-whispered secret path,
text.en-trans: sang lam nyen gyü kyi dakpo

text.en: Skilfully maturing and liberating the fortunate;
text.en-trans: kalden min drol gyi tab khé

text.en: You who guide all beings throughout space:
text.en-trans: dro dön namkha dang nyampė

text.en: Kindly Shepa Dorje, care for me!
text.en-trans: drinchen zhepa dorje dé khyen no

text.en: In this and all my future lives,
text.en-trans: dak ni di chi tsé rab kün tu

text.en: I have no other hope or refuge but you.
text.en-trans: kyab dang ré sa zhen na mé do

text.en: Pray, hold me in your compassion, and, lordly master, care for me!
text.en-trans: tukjé zung shik lama jetsün khyen no

text.en: Bestow the supreme empowerment of your form upon my body,
text.en-trans: ku yi wang chok lü la kur

text.en: And bless me to accomplish the immutable rainbow body.
text.en-trans: po mé jalü drubpar chin gyi lop

text.en: Cause the supreme empowerment of your voice to enter my speech,
text.en-trans: sung gi wang chok ngak la zhuk

text.en: And bless me to accomplish the ceaseless unity of sound-emptiness.
text.en-trans: drak tong gakpa mépar chin gyi lop

text.en: Bestow the supreme empowerment of your wisdom upon my mind,
text.en-trans: tuk kyi wang chok yi la zhuk

text.en: And bless me to realize the dharmakāya of empty-awareness.
text.en-trans: rig tong chö kur tokpar chin gyi lop

text.en: Finally, the lordly master dissolves into light
text.en-trans: tar jetsün lama ö du zhu

text.en: And becomes inseparable from the nature of my awareness:
text.en-trans: rang rigpé shi dang nyi mé dré

text.en: The self-liberation of the ground within the expanse of dharmakāya: Āḥ.
text.en-trans: zhi rang drol chökü long du ah
